summary:
I'm a product designer based in the Netherlands üá≥üá±with experience in delivering end-to-end UX/UI design for software products.

I'm passionate about improving the lives of others through design and am constantly looking to learn new things every day. During my 12 years of experience, I have achieved global awards and helped digital companies build or improve their digital experience, and manage design teams.

- 10 Years‚Äô Experience in a few startups & corporate companies as a Developer, UI UX Designer, and founder
- Winner of multiple Global competitions including Google Business Group Success Stories (Global Winner 2014) & IBM Glovator
- Experience in Television, eCommerce, Government services, Gaming, AR/ VR, Digital Media, and Finance industries 
- Hands-on experience using multiple design tools such as Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD, Framer, and many more
- Experience in rapid growing startups with external investors
- Speaker at multiple UI/UX forums, meetups in Sri Lanka
- Mentor, Judge at multiple Design and Startup Forums

https://vimuux.com

My tools of the trade are Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, AfterEffects, Premiere Pro, Jira, Asana.

Skills:
- UI Design, UX Design
- UX Research
- Wireframing & Prototyping
- Product Design & Product Management
- Design Team Management
- Agile Design Management, Design Sprints

Awards:
- Google Success Stories - Global Winner,
- AngelHack Hackcelerator/ Global Demo Day - Finalist (HypeHash 2016, PlanMash 2018)
- IBM Glovatores at Mobile World Congress - Finalist
